mapper.select: SELECT site_manager.id, site_manager.`code`, site_manager.`name`, site_manager.company_id `company.id`, site_manager.`password`, site_manager.role_id, site_manager.state, company_info.`name` `company.name` FROM site_manager INNER JOIN company_info ON site_manager.company_id = company_info.id WHERE site_manager.id = #{id} AND site_manager.state =1 AND company_info.state =1
